name: Gold Cuff Bracelet with Black and Clear Rhinestones
description: This gold cuff bracelet features a layered design with multiple bands of different textures and patterns. It is embellished with black and clear rhinestones. The bracelet has a wide, open cuff design, making it a statement piece for any outfit.

name: Gold and Green Stone Necklace

name: Versace Leather Bracelet
description: This Versace Leather Bracelet features a white leather strap with gold-tone hardware, a double zipper detail, and a studded design. It's a stylish and edgy accessory that will add a touch of glamour to any outfit.

name: Gold and White Bangles Set
description: This set of bangles features a variety of gold and white finishes, including hammered gold, smooth gold, braided gold, and white resin. The set comes with five bangles in total.

name: Gold Wire Cuff Bracelet
description: This gold wire cuff bracelet features a delicate, interwoven design. The bracelet is made of multiple thin wires that are twisted and intertwined to create a unique and eye-catching piece. The gold finish gives the bracelet a luxurious and elegant look.

name: Swarovski Wrap Bracelet

name: Silver and Crystal Bangle Set
description: This set of bangles features a mix of silver and crystal accents.  The silver bangles have a variety of textures, including hammered, studded, and smooth.  The crystal bangles are a dark smoky color and are set in a silver metal.  The bangles are all adjustable and can be worn together or separately.

name: Diamond Tennis Bracelet

name: Multi-Strand Bangle Set
description: This bangle set features five different bangles, each with a unique design. The top bangle is a silver-tone, twisted wire design. The next bangle down is a gold-tone, twisted wire design. The third bangle down is a silver-tone, floral design. The fourth bangle down is a light green, smooth bangle. The bottom bangle is a light green, woven design.  The bangles are all stacked together, creating a beautiful and eye-catching look.

name: Heart Choker
